column1: # Nice!Nano nRF52840 Development Board Documentation Resources
Below is a comprehensive CSV-formatted list of all available documentation resources for the Nice!Nano nRF52840 development board
column2: organized by category. The CSV includes 90+ unique documentation resources covering official documentation
column3: firmware

column1: The Nice!Nano has exceptional documentation coverage with ZMK firmware being the primary recommended option
column2: offering the most comprehensive wireless keyboard support. The community is particularly active with multiple visual configuration tools and extensive tutorials available.
